title: Ticket #734: Child processes should have a session to parent
description: When the master spawns another daemon, the schedd spawns a shadow, the startd spawns a starter, etc., a security session and key should be established between the two daemons, probably via a pipe.
remarks:
2010-Sep-14 12:14:34 by danb:
This ticket is mostly addressed by #1651. However, the scope of that ticket is somewhat more narrow.
